snippet.title: Red Game Without a Great Name Fly, Die, Retry Trailer [ESRB]
snippet.description:
FLY, DIE, RETRY!

Red Game Without a Great Name is coming to Steam on December 9th! 

It's a challenging 2D arcade game where you play as a mechanical bird traversing a hostile Steampunk world. Prepare to die a lot on barbed wire, spikes, and sawblades. Your only means of survival is your ability to teleport, use it wisely!

You touch and swipe to teleport the bird to it's destination. Make haste because the level scrolls independently to your moves. If you fall behind it's game over. Avoid traps, pick up gears and power-ups and finish all of the 60 levels.

Game features:

- Simple to grasp, hard to master game mechanics
- 60 levels filled with traps to overcome
- 180 gears to collect
- 3 power-ups to enhance your abilities
- Unique art style dominated by red 
- One more level syndrome

For further information visit:

web - http://ifun4all.com
twitter - http://twitter.com/ifun4all
mail - contact[at]ifun4all.com

The video has been edited by Radikal Studio
radikalstudio[at]radikalstudio.pl
